channel.title: Resizing Mapback
channel.description:
Hello Reader,
I been trying to resize my mapback, but I have had no luck with it at the moment.
This is the problem that occurs when I try resizing..
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2rzcp6w.png[/img]
I want it to completely fill above the inventory + I will remove the unnecessary stuff later. Can anyone help me with the stretching, or how I can manage to fix it?
